name: #004 Michael Schumacher Ferrari 2004
description:
Michael Schumacher (1969-) is a german F1 driver who started in F1 in 1991.

He had 155 podiums (OMG!), was pole position 68 times, and won 7 championships (1994, 1995, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003 and 2004). Can you believe it?!

Driving Ferrari's car F2004, he was the ultimate champion on that year... 13 races as the winner!

Unfortunately Michael had an accident in December 2013 while skiing at French Alps Resort of Maribel. He hit his head on a rock while skiing with his son Mick (who became a F1 driver in 2021), and stayed in coma for almost a year. 

He's receiving treatment within today and very little is known about his condition.

We hope you can get better, live a peaceful and glorious life, and be fine, champion!
